sentence: Difference between Software and Computer programs Software engineering is intended to support professional software development, rather than individual programming.
clean_sentence: Difference between Software and Computer programs Software engineering is intended to support professional software development, rather than individual programming.

sentence: It includes techniques that support program specification, design, and evolution, none of which are normally relevant for personal software development.
clean_sentence: It includes techniques that support program specification, design, and evolution, none of which are normally relevant for personal software development.

sentence: Many people think that software is simply another word for computer programs.
clean_sentence: Many people think that software is simply another word for computer programs.

sentence: However, when we are talking about software engineering, software is not just the programs themselves but also all associated documentation and configuration data that is required to make these programs operate correctly.
clean_sentence: However, when we are talking about software engineering, software is not just the programs themselves but also all associated documentation and configuration data that is required to make these programs operate correctly.

sentence: A professionally developed software system is often more than a single program.
clean_sentence: A professionally developed software system is often more than a single program.

sentence: The system usually consists of a number of separate programs and configuration files that are used to set up these programs.
clean_sentence: The system usually consists of a number of separate programs and configuration files that are used to set up these programs.

sentence: It may include system documentation, which describes the structure of the system; user documentation, which explains how to use the system, and websites for users to download recent product information.
clean_sentence: It may include system documentation, which describes the structure of the system; user documentation, which explains how to use the system, and websites for users to download recent product information.

sentence: If you are writing a program for yourself, no one else will use it and you don’t have to worry about writing program guides, documenting the program design, etc.
clean_sentence: If you are writing a program for yourself, no one else will use it and you don’t have to worry about writing program guides, documenting the program design, etc.

sentence: However, if you are writing software that other people will use and other engineers will change then you usually have to provide additional information as well as the code of the program.
clean_sentence: However, if you are writing software that other people will use and other engineers will change then you usually have to provide additional information as well as the code of the program.

sentence: Many applications need software engineering; they do not all need the same software engineering techniques.
clean_sentence: Many applications need software engineering; they do not all need the same software engineering techniques.

sentence: The specific set of attributes that you might expect from a software system obviously depends on its application.
clean_sentence: The specific set of attributes that you might expect from a software system obviously depends on its application.

sentence: Essential attributes of a good software Maintainability Software should be written in such a way so that it can evolve to meet the changing needs of customers.
clean_sentence: Essential attributes of a good software Maintainability Software should be written in such a way so that it can evolve to meet the changing needs of customers.

sentence: Software engineering is an engineering discipline that is concerned with all aspects of software production from the early stages of system specification through to maintaining the system after it has gone into use.
clean_sentence: Software engineering is an engineering discipline that is concerned with all aspects of software production from the early stages of system specification through to maintaining the system after it has gone into use.

header: Software engineering is important for two reasons
sentence: It is usually cheaper, in the long run, to use software engineering methods and techniques for software systems rather than just write the programs as if it was a personal programming project.
clean_sentence: It is usually cheaper, in the long run, to use software engineering methods and techniques for software systems rather than just write the programs as if it was a personal programming project.

header: Software engineering is important for two reasons
sentence: A software process is a sequence of activities that leads to the production of a software product.
clean_sentence: A software process is a sequence of activities that leads to the production of a software product.

sentence: ​ Software specification.
clean_sentence: ​ Software specification.

sentence: There are many different types of software.
clean_sentence: There are many different types of software.

sentence: You use different software engineering techniques for each type of system because the software has quite different characteristics.
clean_sentence: You use different software engineering techniques for each type of system because the software has quite different characteristics.

sentence: 4 Software engineering fundamentals that apply to all types
clean_sentence: Software engineering fundamentals that apply to all types

sentence: 3.​ Understanding and managing the software specification and requirements (what the software should do) are important.
clean_sentence: ​ Understanding and managing the software specification and requirements (what the software should do) are important.

sentence: As a software engineer, you must accept that your job involves wider responsibilities than simply the application of technical skills.
clean_sentence: As a software engineer, you must accept that your job involves wider responsibilities than simply the application of technical skills.
